sentences.en: Any dog bite, no matter how small, needs immediate medical attention.
sentences.cn: 被狗咬后，不管伤口多小，都必须立即就医。

sentences.en: As a society we need to give more attention to the needs of older people.
sentences.cn: 生活在同一社会里，我们得更加关注长者的需求。

sentences.en: As the era wore on, she switched her attention to films.
sentences.cn: 随着这个时代慢慢过去，她把目光投向了电影业。

sentences.en: Attention to detail is essential in this job.
sentences.cn: 关注细节是这份工作所必需的。

sentences.en: During the lecture Sarah’s attention began to wander .
sentences.cn: 上课时，萨拉开始走神了。

sentences.en: He had unmistakably been waving his flag to attract the referee's attention.
sentences.cn: 他显然一直在挥舞旗子吸引主裁判的注意。

sentences.en: He was waving his arms to draw their attention.
sentences.cn: 他正挥手以引起他们的注意。

sentences.en: I noticed that everyone was watching me with rapt attention.
sentences.cn: 我注意到大家都在专注地看着我。

sentences.en: If you paid more attention in class, you might actually learn something!
sentences.cn: 要是你上课更认真些，也许能实实在在地学到些东西！

sentences.en: My attention wasn’t really on the game.
sentences.cn: 我的注意力其实不在比赛上。

sentences.en: No detail was too small to escape her attention.
sentences.cn: 再小的细节都逃不过她的眼睛。

sentences.en: Now he’s gone, I can give you my undivided attention .
sentences.cn: 现在他已经走了，我可以把全部注意力都放在你身上。

sentences.en: Outside each door a guard sprang to attention as they approached.
sentences.cn: 当他们走近时，每扇门外都有一名卫兵肃身立正。

sentences.en: Scott sat down at his desk and turned his attention to the file he had in front of him.
sentences.cn: 斯科特在自己的办公桌前坐下，将注意力转向面前的文件。

sentences.en: She stood preening in their midst, delighted with the attention.
sentences.cn: 她得意洋洋地站在他们中间，为受人瞩目而高兴。

sentences.en: She tried to pay attention to what he was saying.
sentences.cn: 她尽量注意听他说话。

sentences.en: She was a high-maintenance girl who needed lots of attention.
sentences.cn: 她是个很缠人的女孩，需要很多的关注。

sentences.en: She was flattered by all the attention he was giving her.
sentences.cn: 他的关注让她喜不自胜。

sentences.en: The conference may help to focus attention on the economy.
sentences.cn: 此次会议可能有助于将关注焦点放在经济上。

sentences.en: The painting had been executed with meticulous attention to detail.
sentences.cn: 画这幅画的时候，画家非常注意细节。

sentences.en: The virus is getting more and more attention, and not before time.
sentences.cn: 这种病毒正受到越来越多的关注，其实早该如此。

sentences.en: They listened to the speech with close attention .
sentences.cn: 他们很认真地听演讲。

sentences.en: They never learned skills to engage the attention of the others.
sentences.cn: 他们从未学过吸引他人注意的技巧。

sentences.en: This game is fun and is sure to keep the attention of any young student.
sentences.cn: 这个游戏很有趣，一定能使年幼学生保持注意力。

sentences.en: You can propagandize just by calling attention to something.
sentences.cn: 你只要通过唤起人们对某事的注意就能起到宣传的作用。

sentences.en: You may feel unworthy of the attention and help people offer you.
sentences.cn: 你可能会觉得自己不值得别人关心和帮助。

words.tran_cn: 注意地；聚精会神地；周到地

phrases.tran_cn: 过动症，注意力不足过动症；过度活跃症
注意广度；注意力的持续时间

trans.tran_cn: 注意（力），兴趣，关注，照料，维修，殷勤
trans.tran_en: when you carefully listen to, look at, or think about someone or something
